game.name: Yooka-Replaylee
game.shortDescription: Embark on an epic open-world 3D platforming collectathon adventure with Yooka and Laylee! The search for Pagies starts anew in Yooka-Replaylee, the enhanced definitive version of the beloved indie darling with all new challenges, secrets, mechanics, and accessibility options.
game.genres: Action, Open World, RPG, First Person
